OpClass.name: BinOp
OpClass.Op: push(left); push(right); popa; swpab; popa; addb
push(left); push(right); popa; swpab; popa; subb
push(left); push(right); popa; swpab; popa; mulb
push(left); push(right); popa; swpab; popa; divb

OpClass.name: BoolOp
OpClass.Op: push(head); brzi ; popa; swpab; popa; addb
push(left); push(right); popa; swpab; popa; mulb
push(left); push(right); popa; swpab; popa; subb
push(left); push(right); popa; swpab; popa; divb
